page.title: 03A boy at Tilshead School
page.content: When I wake up in the morning I go to the loo. Then I go into the bathroom. I have a bath and then get dressed. I have my breakfast and I get ready for school. When I am ready for school I wait for the mini-bus. Then the mini-bus comes to take me to school. When we get to school we put our things inside and go out to play. Then the bell rings and we go into school and sit down for assembly. Someone puts on some music. We listen and Mr Jones says prayers and reads us a story. Then we do some work. Then it is playtime. Then we do some more work and have SQUIRT which means Super Quiet Un-Interrupted Reading Time. After dinner it is playtime and we do some more work. We have another playtime before the story. Then we go home. When I get home I watch T.V. We have a colour T.V. and a video.
